translation: Frmạvyvukh tvhụ̄ ya rsvl Allah, ae kạfrv myvn th tuhnd ṭryqh hykhi nh kunvụ̄ spdith.
Bh chhusnh ʿbadt kran tuhndyn mʿbvdn hnz vunụ̄ kyns.
Nh chihv tvhụ̄ ʿbadt kran myạnis mʿbvd snz.
Nh hykhi yhi āʿndh zanhh bnith kh bh kya krh ʿbadt tuhndyn mʿbvdn hnz.
Nh hykhi yhi bnith kh tvhụ̄ kya kriv ʿbadt myạns mʿbvd snz. (yʿny bh hyknh mvḥd ạsith khdays shrk anith zanhh. Nh hykiv tvhụ̄ mshrk ạsith mvḥd bnith zanhh.)
Tohyhi thi pnun dyn, me thi pnun dyn. (tohyhi thi pnun bdlh th ʿiivaẓ, me thi pnun bdlh th ʿūẓ.)
